fargment1.fragmentRole: Handles user interaction and updates the model accordingly

fargment2.fragmentRole: Handles user interaction and updates the model accordingly

fargment3.fragmentRole: Represents the UI component responsible for displaying and allowing user interaction with the Celsius temperature slider

fargment4.fragmentRole: Represents the UI component responsible for displaying and allowing user interaction with the Celsius temperature View

fargment5.fragmentRole: Registers a listener on the celsiusProperty

MVC.description: Model-View-Controller design pattern implementation for temperature conversion with embedded Observer pattern to synchronize views with model updates.
constraints: Controller: Handles user input and updates the model.
View: Displays data and allows user interaction.
Model: Manages data and business logic.
Observer: Synchronizes views with model updates.
